articles.title: Meta slapped with child safety probe under sweeping EU tech law - CNBC
articles.description: Facebook parent company Meta on Thursday was hit with a major investigation from the EU into risks of its platforms to minors.
articles.content:
Facebook parent company Meta on Thursday was hit with a major investigation from the European Union into alleged breaches of the bloc's strict online content law over child safety risks.
